name: TheDaytonDailyNewsFlashBriefings
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest news & headlines from The Dayton Daily News.
Links to the full stories from the briefing will be available on your Alexa app home screen.
Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find “Flash Briefing” to move The Dayton Daily News to the top of your news brief.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
